abilities.name: Loaded Dice
abilities.description: Innate: Every time Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he gains 1 − 6 (based on probability).
descriptions: Innate: Every time Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he gains 1 − 6 (based on probability).
Since his dice is loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining  6.

abilities.name: Wild Cards
abilities.description: Active: Twisted Fate unleashes three cards in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
descriptions: Active: Twisted Fate unleashes three cards in a cone in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
Enemies can only be damaged once by Wild Cards.

abilities.name: Pick a Card
abilities.description: Active: Twisted Fate cycles through  three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Choosing one by reactivating Pick a Card converts Twisted Fate's next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected. The attack applies both on-hit and spell effects, but cannot  critically strike.
descriptions: Active: Twisted Fate cycles through  three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Choosing one by reactivating Pick a Card converts Twisted Fate's next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected. The attack applies both on-hit and spell effects, but cannot  critically strike.
Recast -  Red Card: Deals magic damage around the target and  slows all enemies hit for 2.5 seconds.
Recast -  Gold Card:  Stuns the target.
Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by  crowd control.

abilities.name: Stacked Deck
abilities.description: Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed.
descriptions: Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed.
Twisted Fate gains a stack of Stacked Deck on-hit, up to a maximum of three.
At 3 stacks, his next basic attack against  non-structures consumes the stacks on-hit to deal bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Destiny
abilities.description: Active: Twisted Fate summons an identifying eyeball above all targetable enemy  champions for a few seconds,  revealing them for the duration. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Twisted Fate summons an identifying eyeball above all targetable enemy  champions for a few seconds,  revealing them for the duration. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds.
Recast: Twisted Fate  channels for 1.5 seconds and then  blinks to the target location upon completion,  destroying all  projectiles targeting him in the process.

name: Twisted Fate
title: the Card Master
blurb: Twisted Fate is an infamous cardsharp and swindler who has gambled and charmed his way across much of the known world, earning the enmity and admiration of the rich and foolish alike. He rarely takes things seriously, greeting each day with a mocking...
